translations: n．可怜的人，不幸的人：处境困苦、遭受痛苦或不幸的人。
· The wretches were left homeless after the earthquake.
地震后，那些可怜的人无家可归。

sentences.sentence: They will scourge thee, the stony-hearted wretches!
sentences.translation: 他们会鞭打你，这些铁石心肠的坏蛋！

sentences.sentence: He thought of the hobbling wretches whom he had seen carrying cans and bottles to be filled by the barman.
sentences.translation: 他想起了他曾见过的那些跛着脚、拿着罐子和瓶子要酒保给他们倒酒的可有可无的人。

sentences.sentence: He has sympathy for those homeless wretches.
sentences.translation: 他同情那些无家可归的可怜人。
